Forensic Economics Services in Phoenix

Our forensic economics practice provides economic damage analysis for litigation matters throughout Phoenix and Arizona. We combine economic methodology with local market knowledge to deliver accurate, damage calculations.

Personal Injury & Wrongful Death

Economic loss calculations for catastrophic injuries and wrongful death cases in Phoenix:

  • Lost earnings and earning capacity
  • Fringe benefits valuation
  • Household services losses
  • Loss of parental guidance
  • Present value calculations
  • Life expectancy adjustments

Employment Litigation

Economic damages for workplace disputes and discrimination cases:

  • Wrongful termination damages
  • Front pay and back pay calculations
  • Lost benefits and pension values
  • Mitigation analysis
  • Statistical discrimination analysis
  • Wage and hour violations

Commercial Damages

Business economic losses for commercial litigation:

  • Lost profits calculations
  • Business interruption losses
  • Breach of contract damages
  • Unfair competition impacts
  • Intellectual property damages
  • Reasonable royalty rates

Phoenix Courts Served

  • Maricopa County professional Court
  • U.S. District Court for the District of Arizona
  • State appellate courts
  • Alternative dispute resolution

Our Forensic Economics Methodology

1. Case Review

Comprehensive review of case materials, medical records, employment history, and relevant economic data specific to Phoenix.

2. Economic Analysis

Detailed calculations using Arizona wage data, industry statistics, and economic projections relevant to the Phoenix market.

3. Report Preparation

Clear, expert reports that meet court requirements.

4. Expert Testimony

courtroom testimony that clearly explains complex economic concepts to judges and juries.

Phoenix Economic Expertise

Our forensic economics practice combines national experience with knowledge of the Phoenix economy. We understand the local labor market, wage patterns, industry composition, and economic trends that impact damage calculations in Arizona litigation.

Local Wage Data

Access to Phoenix-specific wage surveys and compensation data for accurate earnings projections.

Industry Knowledge

Understanding of major Phoenix employers and industry sectors for relevant economic analysis.

Court Experience

testimony experience in Phoenix courts with knowledge of local procedures and preferences.
